name: Steel Dynamics, Inc.
description: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (SDI) is one of the largest domestic steel producers and metal recyclers in the United States, founded in 1993. The company operates steel mills, steel fabrication facilities, and a network of scrap recycling operations, making it a key player in the manufacturing and recycling industries. Steel Dynamics is committed to producing high-quality steel products, including hot-rolled, cold-rolled, and coated sheet steel, as well as rebar and structural steel. With a strong focus on sustainability, Steel Dynamics emphasizes environmental stewardship and the efficient use of resources, utilizing electric arc furnace technology which has a lower environmental impact compared to traditional steelmaking processes. The company also prioritizes innovation, investing in advanced technologies and processes to enhance productivity and product quality. With multiple production sites across the Midwest and Southern regions of the United States, Steel Dynamics serves a diverse range of customers in construction, automotive, and consumer goods sectors. The company's mission is to be the most innovative and customer-oriented steel producer in the industry, delivering superior products and value while maintaining a commitment to safety, sustainability, and community engagement.
